author: cnbc.com
title: Alturna-Tech Names Eileen Nekava as Marketing Manager
text:
Florida’s Fastest Growing IT Solutions Provider, Alturna-Tech adds Senior Marketing Manager to the team
BOCA RATON, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Alturna-Tech, a highly focused IT Solutions Provider that is driving the Next Generation of IT Transformation by delivering New, Innovative and Disruptive technologies, recently acquired the talents of Eileen Nekava as their new Marketing Manager and will be working out of the company’s new Corporate HQ in Boca Raton, FL.
Eileen is a proven marketing professional with over 14 years of industry experience in channel management, technical and sales marketing, demand generation and marketing communications. She also possesses extensive knowledge of the IT industry and how to create and execute go to market strategic plans.
“Eileen’s marketing expertise and extensive knowledge of our industries technologies was a perfect fit for Alturna-Tech,” said Paul Goldberg, CEO of Alturna-Tech. “We partner with the leading innovative and disruptive technologies in the industry such as Nutanix, Rubrik, Cloudian, Infinidat, Plexxi, CloudGenix and Avi Networks and having an experienced marketing manager who has both the marketing and technical background is critical to our success in delivering relevant messaging that aligns with our partners and meets the needs of our customers.
About Alturna-Tech
Alturna-Tech is a high impact focused IT Solutions Provider that is driving the Next Generation of IT Transformation by delivering New, Innovative and Disruptive technologies which challenge the status quo of the legacy data center incumbent solutions, by reducing the complexity of IT, by simplifying the management of IT and by lowering the cost of IT.
Alturna-Tech was recognized in 2017 by the South Florida Business Journal as the #1 Ranked Fastest Growing Private Company in South Florida and the #2 Ranked Fastest Growing Technology Company in South Florida.
For more information, visit http://www.alturna-tech.com .
